* WARNING: RESULTS MAY VARY. CONSUME AT YOUR OWN RISK. LINDY HOP MAY CAUSE DIZZINESS, EXCITEDNESS, AND HAPPINESS, AND MAY LEAD TO UNEXPLAINED GRINS TO DEVELOP ON YOUR VISAGE. PROLONGED EXPOSURE TO EXCESSIVE SWING-OUTS MAY ALSO CAUSE ADDITIONAL BLURRED VISION OR LIGHTHEADEDNESS. BEFORE PARTAKING IN LINDY HOP, PLEASE CONSULT YOUR DOCTOR OR PHARMACIST ESPECIALLY IF YOU ARE EXPECTING, PLANNING TO EXPECT, EXPECTING TO PLAN, OR A COMBINATION THEREOF. DRINKING ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES MIGHT CLOUD YOUR JUDGMENT AND MAY CAUSE YOU TO BELIEVE YOU ARE A BETTER DANCER THAN YOU ACTUALLY ARE. DO NOT LINDY HOP WHILE DRIVING OR OPERATING HEAVY MACHINERY. DOING SO MAY RESULT IN SEVERE INJURIES INCLUDING DISMEMBERMENT, AND/OR DEATH. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED. HAVE A NICE DAY.
